name: Cenóte
description:
Play as Finley. When you touch water you absorb it and grow in size until you become a sea monkey. When you are in the air you dry out and become a land monkey.

WASD to move. Left click interacts with things that highlight. Right click to squeeze which makes you grow or shrink faster.

You can pick up isopods while you are a land monkey and put them into pitcher plants. You can eat fish when you are a sea monkey.  In either form you can tap conches to raise or lower certain bodies of water. Find and Eat as many fish as you can find!

Happy Chomping!

Done for the 2023 spring 48 hour IGDA game jam at UW Stout. 

A Game by: Cole Nugteren, Dorian Blossom, Elizabeth Geoffery, Gavin Hefty, Jacob Buelow, Sam Baeseman
